text: Stefania Liberakakis (born 17 December 2002), known by her first name Stefania, is a Greek singer and actress who was born in the Netherlands. She has released over 20 singles and appeared in several films and TV shows. In 2013, Stefania was a contestant on the Dutch version of The Voice. In 2016, she was part of the girl group Kisses, who represented the Netherlands at the Junior Eurovision Song Contest 2016. The group finished 8th out of 17 entries. In 2020, it was announced that Stefania would represent Greece at the Eurovision Song Contest 2020 with the song "Supergirl". The contest was cancelled due to the COVID-19 pandemic. For the 2021 contest, Stefania returned to represent Greece, but this time with the song "Last Dance". Her performance was notable for containing green screen effects with dancers. He finished 10th out of 26 entries. == References == Category:2002 births Category:Living people Category:Greek singers Category:Eurovision Song Contest entrants
title: Stefania
